title: Ryland (Under The Apple Tree)
lyrics:
Bright summertime
Pour the wine
We've got time
I'll make you mine
Under the apple tree

I planted for my love and me



Your hand upon my breast

In my sundress

You steal a kiss

How sweet it is



Under the apple tree

I planted for my love and me



Come September we'll be swimming inside (.....)

And we'll press the fruit into butter

And we'll bake it into pies

[Hold me all night?]

I'll love you like, a butterfly

Just let me lie



Under the apple tree

I planted for my love and me



Come September we'll be swimming inside (.....)

And we'll press the fruit into butter

And we'll bake it into pies

[Hold me oh my?]

I'll love you like, like a butterfly

Just let me lie



Under the apple tree

I planted for my love and me



I planted for my love and me
